Read about Omen Laptops

The HP OMEN: gaming laptops for the serious gamer

If you're looking for a business laptop, you're in the wrong place my friend â the HP OMEN laptops range is engineered for one thing and one thing only â gaming.

Starting at an incredibly competitive price, the OMEN series has dual speakers, the highest quality processors, some of the best graphics cards from NVIDIA and AMD such as NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or AMD Ryzen 7, and a great screen size selection to provide you with a gaming experience like never before.

When you choose from the HP OMEN range, performance in any game you choose is a guarantee. Ready to go from win to win?

The HP OMEN laptop is packed with features

Pick your OMEN and play with confidence. With stunning 16-17 inch screen display options, immaculate audio, outstanding battery life, a backlit keyboard and a matte black finish, you'll be sold the moment you get your hands on one of these bad boysâand that's before you even see the specs.

On that note, let's take a peek inside.

FAQs

Note: The following content serves as general information and not an authorization from HP. For assistance, please contact HP technical support and for latest product information, please browse / visit the HP store. Refer to Terms & Conditions for more info.

Q1: What is OMEN laptop?
OMEN is a brand of high-performance gaming laptops designed for gamers and feature powerful hardware, fast displays, and advanced cooling systems to provide an immersive gaming experience. They typically come with the latest processors, graphics cards, and high-capacity storage options, making them suitable for demanding gaming applications and other resource-intensive tasks. Some OMEN laptops also come with customizable backlit keyboards, audio features, and VR-ready hardware for an immersive gaming experience. The brand is targeted at serious gamers and technology enthusiasts who want the best performance and features for their gaming needs.


Q2: Is HP OMEN good for students?
 HP OMEN laptops are designed for gaming and are more suitable for demanding applications and high-performance tasks. While they can be used for general computing, they may be overkill for typical student needs such as word processing, web browsing, and basic multimedia tasks.


Q3: Does OMEN have touch screen?
The availability of a touch screen in an HP OMEN laptop depends on the specific model and configuration you choose. If you're interested in purchasing an HP OMEN laptop with a touch screen, be sure to check the specifications of the specific model you're interested in before making a purchase. Please check with the store on its availability if you like to have the feature.


Q4: Is OMEN a metal laptop?
The construction material of HP OMEN laptops can vary depending on the specific model. Some models may be made of metal, while others may be made of plastic or a combination of materials. To determine the construction material of a specific HP OMEN laptop, you can check the product specifications on the HP website or refer to the product information that comes with the laptop.


Q5: Can HP OMEN run without battery?
Most HP OMEN laptops are designed to run on AC power and require a battery to provide backup power in case of a power outage. Running an HP OMEN laptop without a battery installed is not recommended as it can cause damage to the laptop or reduce its performance.


Q6: Is OMEN Intel or AMD?
HP OMEN laptops can be equipped with either Intel or AMD processors, depending on the specific model and configuration you choose. The choice between Intel and AMD processors in an HP OMEN laptop will depend on your specific needs and preferences, including performance requirements, budget, and other factors.


Q7: What graphics card does OMEN use?
HP OMEN laptops can be equipped with a range of graphics cards, including both integrated graphics and dedicated graphics cards. The specific graphics card used in an HP OMEN laptop will depend on the specific model and configuration you choose.
Some of the most common dedicated graphics card options in HP OMEN laptops include Nvidia GeForce and AMD Radeon graphics cards. To determine which graphics card is available in a specific HP OMEN laptop, you can check the product specifications on the HP website or refer to the product information that comes with the laptop.


Q8: Is HP OMEN heavy?
The weight of an HP OMEN laptop can vary depending on the specific model and configuration you choose. Some HP OMEN laptops are relatively lightweight and portable, while others are heavier and designed for more demanding applications and use cases.
The weight of an HP OMEN laptop will depend on factors such as screen size, battery size, and the materials used in the laptop's construction. To determine the weight of a specific HP OMEN laptop, you can check the product specifications on the HP website or refer to the product information that comes with the laptop.
